candidates.title: Your pictures on the theme of 'sculpture'
candidates.content:
We asked our readers to send in their best pictures on the theme "sculpture". Here are some of the pictures we received from around the world.
The next theme is "my favourite food" and the deadline for entries is 6 April 2021.
The pictures will be published later that week and you will be able to find them, along with other galleries, on the In Pictures section of the website.
You can upload your entries on this page or email them to yourpics@bbc.co.uk.
Further details and themes are at: We set the theme, you take the pictures.
All photographs subject to copyright.
candidates.description: A selection of striking images from our readers on this week's theme.

result.explanation: The provided external evidence is irrelevant to the news caption.  The BBC article is about a reader photography submission on the theme of sculpture, and makes no mention of the Yorkshire Sculpture Park, lockdowns, or family trips. Therefore, there is no basis to judge the accuracy of the caption using this source. The evidence is unreliable in relation to the claim.
result.supporting_points: Source 1 is a call for reader photographs on the theme of "sculpture" and does not contain any information about the Yorkshire Sculpture Park, lockdowns, or family trips.  There is no connection between the caption and the content of the source.

final_result.explanation: The image shows a sculpture of a pregnant woman.
